verses.verse: Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to me, Go<WH3212> yet,<WH5750> love<WH157> a woman<WH802> beloved<WH157> of her friend,<WH7453> yet an adulteress,<WH5003> according to the love<WH160> of the LORD<WH3068> toward<WH854> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> who<WH1992> look<WH6437> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and love<WH157> flagons<WH809> of wine.<WH6025>
So I bought<WH3739> her to me for fifteen<WH2568> <WH6240> pieces of silver,<WH3701> and for an homer<WH2563> of barley,<WH8184> and an half homer<WH3963> of barley:<WH8184>

And I said<WH559> to her, You shall abide<WH3427> for me many<WH7227> days;<WH3117> you shall not play the harlot,<WH2181> and you shall not be for another man:<WH376> so<WH1571> will I also<WH1571> be for you.

For the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall abide<WH3427> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> without<WH369> a king,<WH4428> and without<WH369> a prince,<WH8269> and without<WH369> a sacrifice,<WH2077> and without<WH369> an image,<WH6755> and without<WH369> an ephod,<WH646> and without teraphim:<WH8655>

Afterward<WH310> shall the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> return,<WH7725> and seek<WH1245> the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and David<WH1732> their king;<WH4428> and shall fear<WH6342> the LORD<WH3068> and his goodness<WH2898> in the latter<WH319> days.<WH3117>
